file_content.text: We can't win, sir. I don't understand why we stay.
The Republic is dug in too deep. They outnumber us three to one!
Shortsighted, as always. This campaign was never about annihilation, or even winning.
We're here to drag the Republic into an unwinnable conflict, to tie up their resources.
Every day we keep them here spinning their wheels is another victory for the Empire. Remember that.
